DOC.brief_title: SFGH Health Advocates Stage II Study
DOC.detailed_description: Adverse social circumstance like hunger food insecurity dramatic , negative impact health vulnerable child . In safety-net setting , prevalence adverse social circumstance high . The investigator propose RCT intervention base large urban pediatric urgent care set address patient ' social circumstance . In early RCT conduct similar setting , intervention help decrease total social need parent report child health single item measure . In study , investigator collect robust set survey data include detailed measure child health non-invasive biological data child caregiver accompany child . Families randomize accord pre-determined randomization schedule social needs-focused intervention . In one arm , investigator offer intervention , involve in-person navigation around available social legal resource ; , investigator offer write information participant available community resource . All patient arm follow six month period capture information change participant ' social need , health health care utilization .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Child/ParentLegal Guardian Caregiver Dyad ; Child SFGH Pediatric Urgent Care Clinic Patient 0 17 year age ; Parent Legal Guardian Caregiver equal 18 year old ; English Spanish speaking Parent Legal Guardian Caregiver ; Both reside San Francisco County . NonEnglish nonSpanish speaking Parent Legal Guardian Caregiver ; Parent legal guardian caregiver age 18 ; Parent legal guardian caregiver accompany patient familiar child 's living situation ; Family participate study previously ; NonSan Francisco County resident ; Foster child child clinic child protective clearance exam .
